title: Nutriota Vitamin B6 | 10 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: VITAMIN B6 10 MG PER HIGH CONCENTRATION CAPSULE - Each vegan capsule contains 10 mg of vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride). Each bottle contains 180 capsules. Vitamin B6 is an important component of the essential nutrients of the B vitamin group that helps support normal nervous and immune system functions.
descriptionContent: Vitamin B6 belongs to the essential nutrients of the B vitamin group and is a popular dietary supplement. Our body is unable to produce vitamin B6, so we need to take it through food or supplements. This essential nutrient supports mood regulation and emotional balance while helping relieve fatigue and maintain healthy energy levels.
ingredientsContent: Bulking agent (microcrystalline cellulose), capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropyl methylcellulose), pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6), anti-caking agent (magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide).
generalInfoContent:
Package Dimensions: 10.9 x 5.7 x 5.6 cm; 58.5 g
Units: 180.0 Count
